New Records: Cape Verde's Bebe scored a goal from a 40-yard free-kick, a notable achievement in the match
Key Match Events: Cape Verde won the match 3-0 against Mozambique
Mozambique's defensive errors contributed to their loss
Kevin Pina scored a brilliant third goal for Cape Verde
Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde were aiming to progress in the tournament with a strong performance
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde's victory qualified them for the last 16 of the Africa Cup of Nations
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of Group B in the Africa Cup of Nations
